Submit Comment Sports Items #about_main About US CityU Flea Market Get idle items moving. Application Introduction CityU Flea Market is an idle goods trading platform specifically designed for college students. Say goodbye to the cumbersome group chats and forums, and let the idle items flow freely within the campus. We connect both buyers and sellers, ensuring that every piece of idle goods can find a new owner, and making every transaction simple and reassuring. Functional Characteristics • Convenient product release
• Intelligent product categorization
• Secure transaction environment
• Campus-exclusive platform Enter Homepage #changepwd Please be sure to change your password carefully Current User： Old Password Please enter your old password New Password Please enter a new password Confirm Password Please confirm your new password Confirm Change #kind page2-4 Household Items Electrical Devices Study Stuffs #login_main Welcome Back Please log in to your account Please enter your user account Please enter your password Sign in Do not have any account yet?
